channel.title: Can You Imagine?
channel.description:
Can Anyone imagine what RuneScape is going to look like when the revision is like 1200+ lol i believe runescape will fail by then because of how futuristic and gay its getting....
What do you think???
Discuss/

item.title: Can You Imagine?
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Sparta I Am Sparta
item.description:
@I_Am_Sparta wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:16, topic:424186”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=526843.msg3839192#msg3839192 date=1323120587]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=526843.msg3838854#msg3838854 date=1323085569]

RuneScape = WoW more and more every update, which is Why i quit.
[/quote]Except they’re going the opposite path of WoW and always have.

I feel like I’m seeing a dumbed-down WoW game.
[/quote]Then you must lack eye-sight. When i see WoW i see a dumbed down Everquest.[/quote]
[size=18pt]I like WoW :S[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Can You Imagine?
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

There was no forewarning that it would happen. I remember PKing as the System update: 3:00 came up on the screen…

Read full topic

item.title: Can You Imagine?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:25, topic:424186”]^So pretty much proof that these new marketing schemes are not really helping. And that they should of stayed with 2007 to of remained the best.

When people say RuneScape went to shit after 2007 (I believe the day the Wilderness was removed out of the blue was the beginning of it all), it really is true… a steady decline in traffic proves this as more and more people realise that Jagex aren’t that great after all.[/quote]
It wasn’t really “out-of-the-blue”. RRT was becoming sorta a problem, but after the wild was removed it was huge.

Read full topic

^So pretty much proof that these new marketing schemes are not really helping. And that they should of stayed with 2007 to of remained the best.

item.title: Can You Imagine?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:18, topic:424186”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=526843.msg3839197#msg3839197 date=1323120697]

[quote author=ox random xi link=topic=526843.msg3839192#msg3839192 date=1323120587]

RuneScape = WoW more and more every update, which is Why i quit.
[/quote]Except they’re going the opposite path of WoW and always have.

I feel like I’m seeing a dumbed-down WoW game.
[/quote]Then you must lack eye-sight. When i see WoW i see a dumbed down Everquest.

They’re going towards more graphicly wise now then game-wise, as in the old era were it was all about the game, and not just graphics.
Now, I’m not saying graphics are bad but they’re starting to ruin the game. >_>[/quote]Since when did WoW EVER give a shit about graphics? It looks awful, not to mention it is made to run on older systems.

Read full topic

item.title: Can You Imagine?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:20, topic:424186”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=526843.msg3839615#msg3839615 date=1323131364]
I can’t wait to see it in 10 years.
[/quote]

LOL
They’ll be bankrupt by then if they continue the updates they’re continuing now.[/quote]
They’ll realize they want WoW and Blizzard will pick them up to create a Java-based WoW.

Read full topic

item.title: Can You Imagine?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:16, topic:424186”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=526843.msg3839192#msg3839192 date=1323120587]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=526843.msg3838854#msg3838854 date=1323085569]

RuneScape = WoW more and more every update, which is Why i quit.
[/quote]Except they’re going the opposite path of WoW and always have.

I feel like I’m seeing a dumbed-down WoW game.
[/quote]Then you must lack eye-sight. When i see WoW i see a dumbed down Everquest.[/quote]
They’re going towards more graphicly wise now then game-wise, as in the old era were it was all about the game, and not just graphics.
Now, I’m not saying graphics are bad but they’re starting to ruin the game. >_>

Read full topic

item.title: Can You Imagine?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:2, topic:424186”]RuneScape = WoW more and more every update, which is Why i quit.[/quote]WoW sells disks. WoW doesn’t do updates weekly. WoW has a price 2.85X that of Runescape. WoW has onscreen-interfaced combat. Exactly how other than Runescape updating graphics like any game should?

And we already have a “future jagex updates” topic, this is the same thing, in desperation for accounts.

Read full topic

item.title: Can You Imagine?
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

I need an account but im not begging, in addition i would play if i could due to the quests that have been added since i started. I also enjoy the new items
